summary: In Paris, a young American is in debt to a nightclub owner, who forces him to woo an heiress in hopes of reaping her fortune.
cast: Loretta Young|Tyrone Power|Adolphe Menjou|Gregory Ratoff|Charles Winninger|Helen Westley|Christian Rub|Ferdinand Gottschalk|Georges Renavent|Leonid Kinskey|Hal K. Dawson|Paul Porcasi|André Cheron|George Beranger|Demetrius Alexis|Lynn Bari|Eugene Borden|Fred Cavens|Louise Clark|Albert Conti|Marcelle Corday|Gino Corrado|George Davis|Jean De Briac|Charles De Ravenne|Mario Dominici|Octavio Giraud|Sam Harris|George Herbert|Ramsay Hill|Armand Kaliz|Jacques Lory|Jean Masset|Frank McLure|Louis Mercier|Bert Moorhouse|Alberto Morin|Manuel París|Jean Perry|John S. Peters|Albert Pollet|Jules Raucourt|Rolfe Sedan|Leonid Snegoff|Michael Visaroff|Frederick Vogeding
title: Café Metropol
